articles.title: Historic Martian Milestone: NASA's Curiosity Rover Clocks 4,000 Days on Mars - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Curiosity mission team is making sure the robotic scientist, now in its fourth extended mission, is staying strong, despite the wear and tear from its 11-year journey. Four thousand Martian days after setting its wheels in Gale Crater on August 5, 2012, N…
articles.content:
ByJet Propulsion LaboratoryNovember 7, 2023
After 4,000 days on Mars, NASAs Curiosity rover continues to explore the ancient climate of the Red Planet, recently drilling its 39th sample from the sul… [+7862 chars]
